text:
="preserve">Günther Pfaff (12 August 1939 – 10 November 2020) was an Austrian sprint canoeist. He competed from the mid-1960s to the mid-1970s. He was in four Summer Olympics, he won a bronze in the K-2 1000 m event at Mexico City in 1968.
Pfaff also won four medals at the ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships. He was born in Vienna.
Pfaff died on 10 November 2020 in Vienna, aged 81.
